entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 50 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
